participant_abstract.sent: The conceptual design phase was very interesting.
Our interface user designer proposed different concepts of remote control.
We decided to create a fancy, easy-to-use, fashion and techonologically advanced remote control.

participant_actions.sent: Discussions about the concept of the remote control Final discussion about the choice of the material = wood and LCD buttons, with cheap chip Evaluation of the clay remote control.

participant_decisions.sent: The concept for the remote control will be the following: -google controller = easy-to-use and powerful.
Fancy controller = fashion look Concerning the material used: -wood with low-level chip.
LCD buttons Technology added to the remote control: voice recognition for simple command Added value: solar energy and battery: would attract ecologist consumers.

participant_problems.sent: Fashion in Paris and Milan: fruit and vegetables Need of a "spongy" remote control.
Choice of the material = wood, not very spongy: use instead spongy.
